attributes.action: Abolish Stamp Duty for first time buyers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is disgraceful that first time buyers shuld pay a tax to the government. It is nearly impossible to enter the property market. There should be additional support and relief for first time buyers.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " Abolish Stamp Duty for first time buyers."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16940


Prime Minister's Office
